DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether methylphenidate effective treatment binge eat disorder , randomize control trial extend release methylphenidate versus cognitive behavioral therapy binge eat disorder overweight obese adult female .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Methylphenidate Cognitive Behavioural Therapy Treatment Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Fifty-six adult female outpatient binge eat disorder receive 12 week methylphenidate ( dosage 18-72 mg ) 12 session manualized cognitive behavioral therapy . Participants complete interviewer-rated self-report measure eat , mood , attention , personality feature treatment , 6 week treatment , immediately treatment complete , 3 month treatment complete .
